column1: ConditionsAll existing traffic and parking controls and restrictionsshall apply without a Special Traffic Permit issued bySFMTA. Please check Blue Book for traffic restrictions.To obtain a Blue Book, contact SFMTA at 415-701-4673.A minimum of 4 feet of clearance should be availableat all times to allow for public path of travel.Pursuant to Article 29 of the San Francisco PoliceCode, a Night Noise Permit for operation in the PublicRight-of-Way shall be required for work that createsany noise 5dBA above the ambient noise level of thatarea at the nearest property plane.No noise permitted between the hours of 7:00PM and7:00AM.Event/Operation:Permit Linear Footage20Elements of OccupancyParking truck and trailer for splice fiber optic cableFrom:6/12/2017 8:00AMStart Time8:00AMTo:6/15/2017 5:00PMEnd Time5:00PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at (415)553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredCALL FOR Special traffic permit MAY BE required(Please check DPT Blue Book for any trafficrestrictions; to obtain a "Blue Book", please contactMTA at (415) 701-4673).Food:NOther:Performing Arts:NStreet Space Hours8:00AM Thru 5:00PMMeter Segment(s)Night NoiseWork Scope
